SELECT * FROM store s LEFT JOIN local l ON s.id = l.store_id LEFT JOIN industry i ON s.id = i.store_id LEFT JOIN restaurant r ON i.id = r.industry_id LEFT JOIN cafe c ON i.id = c.industry_id LEFT JOIN bar b ON i.id = b.industry_id LEFT JOIN theme t ON s.id = t.store_id WHERE s.id = #{storeId}

SELECT DISTINCT s.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Member_Like ml WHERE ml.store_id = s.id) AS likeCount, s.views AS viewCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review r WHERE r.store_id = s.id) AS reviewCount FROM store s LEFT JOIN local l ON s.id = l.store_id LEFT JOIN industry i ON s.id = i.store_id LEFT JOIN theme t ON s.id = t.store_id
AND l.local = #{location}
AND i.industry = #{industry}
AND s.id IN (SELECT store_id FROM restaurant WHERE restaurant = #{subCategory})
AND s.id IN (SELECT store_id FROM cafe WHERE cafe = #{subCategory})
AND s.id IN (SELECT store_id FROM bar WHERE bar = #{subCategory})
AND t.theme IN
#{theme}
ORDER BY likeCount DESC
ORDER BY viewCount DESC
ORDER BY reviewCount DESC
